# Supporting the health of aging populations  

&nbsp;

## Substantive Expertise

1.  Concurrent progression of complex chronic conditions

2.  Identification of potentially modifiable risk and protective factors (i.e.; comorbid chronic conditions, dietary intake, food insecurity)

3.  Cohort dynamics in population health and aging

## Methodological Expertise

1.  General linear mixed modeling (e.g.; Gaussian, logit, Poisson, and ZINB distributions; multilevel modeling)

2.  Latent variable modeling (e.g.; latent growth models, latent class/profile analysis, etc.)

3.  Analysis of complex longitudinal health data (e.g.; household clustered national probability samples; non-random missing data)
